title: Losing interest
text:
Iâ€™ve played this game for years. Recently thereâ€™s a number of things that make me want to uninstall and never play again.

1. You lose a life if you leave the level before making a move. 
2. The game â€œstealsâ€ lives and bonuses ALL THE TIME. Iâ€™ll be in the middle of a level and if I exit the app, Iâ€™ll come back and be at the home screen again. Iâ€™ve also left out of a level with timed bonuses and come back to the bonuses being completely gone and they werenâ€™t used and the time hadnâ€™t elapsed. An app as established as this one should not be having these cheap glitches and issues. Terrible

I also agree with another review. Iâ€™ve been playing around 5 years and Iâ€™ve NEVER gotten a â€œjackpotâ€ on the free spin. Which is so dumb because the game gives a way a fair amount of â€œfreebiesâ€

title: Great potential ...
text:
But it's clear from early on this is just a reverse ATM. Instead of charging a fee for the game and letting people enjoy it, they create impossible levels that can only be solved by spending real money. I guess the model works, but so does the review system. Karma: one star.

While some higher levels require a great deal of luck AND some purchases, eventually you get to level 1043, which is mathematically impossible, even with in-game purchases.

title: This game and itâ€™s update is complete and total garbage
text: Iâ€™m on level 4,600. Needless to say, I have spent many many years playing this game. Iâ€™ve also spent a lot of money on this game (regrettably). As you can imagine, being on level 4000+ and above is NOT easy and being able to leave the level before making any moves is almost critical to helping me continue on as it helps me get a good idea how the board looks, what my objective is, and how to distribute my boosters. I am confused as to why they would change it now, after so many years. The game was just fine. Iâ€™ve put a lot of time in effort into this game but itâ€™s clear that they only care about making money and not about loyalty to their players or preservation of the game. King is a joke and this game is trash.

title: Bye bye, Candy Crush
text: I have been playing this game for YEARS.  I was at level 4500+ (unsure of the last level I cleared because I deleted the game).  Over the past year every game change has made the game less fun.  First came the earned boosters being available for minutes instead of being added for me to use when I decide to use them.  Then the daily bonuses became available for minutes as well.  The straw that broke my camelâ€™s back was last week when backing out of a game board in order to get a more desirable board configuration cost me a life.  All of these changes are designed to make me pay money to keep playing.  NO MORE.  I QUIT.

title: Love the game! Not the new changes!!
text:
I play this game every day to unwind but this new update has brought a lot of changes that I feel being the game really down. There used to be opportunities to watch an ad for a couple seconds and then get a reward. Either a life or a booster. I donâ€™t understand why you got rid of this, the ad was always short with the rare occasion of one lasting 10 seconds. 
The next thing that has gone away is the level boosters. For each level you won the first time playing you got a booster and youâ€™d get more each level. Then when youâ€™d lose youâ€™d only lose one booster at a time. This was always fun and really helped when you didnâ€™t have any boosters to use. Iâ€™m not sure why these things were taken away. I keep getting stuck on levels and playing them endlessly waiting to open another treasure box hoping that I will get a booster that will help me beat the level. 
The only thing that has changed that I like is now you can chose when to claim the treasure after collecting the special candies. Itâ€™s nice that if you donâ€™t have anymore lives you can wait until you have more to open it because most of the time the boosters have a time limit of 15 minutes. 
Iâ€™m hoping the game has a few bugs to be worked out after the update and things will go back to the way they were soon. If not I donâ€™t know how much longer I can keep playing. Iâ€™m not completely levels like I used to, so whatâ€™s the point really. Itâ€™s frustrating to play the same level 100 with nothing to show from it. Now Iâ€™ve read that other people no longer can back out of the board without losing a life, I never knew that was a thing but I wish I had!! So bring it back!!
Please please fix it!!! I donâ€™t want to stop playing!! Please!!! Iâ€™m going to keep sending the same review until they fix these changes. Itâ€™s a terrible game and rather pointless without the stuff I mentioned above.

title: Stressful
text: I no longer enjoy playing Candy crush. The refresh button is now the end game button. This feature helps players like me b/c I donâ€™t get boosters. I log in everyday & I donâ€™t get log in boosters like my husband. He rarely plays but when he does, he gets timed boosters just for logging in. He gets messages that say Weâ€™ve Missed You. He Also gets Extra boosters for Each game by watching commercials. We both got the feature a year ago but king took the feature from me & my husband still has it. When I contacted King they say itâ€™s random testing, but itâ€™s been a year. After I contacted them about the unfairness, they changed the refresh button to the end game button. Now Iâ€™m officially done. I will return when they become fair to all players & return the refresh button

title: General User feedback
text:
Understanding good product development relies on user feedback.... my feelings are that I do not like when fish run about and do not contribute to the goal of the level. Same goes with any other bonus feature activated.  

I am also NOT happy that I can no longer back out of a game that I have never made a move on.  I have to forgo a life if I click on the wrong level in error??? Not cool.

title: After years of playing
text: I finished the game and look forward to Wednesdayâ€™s to play new levels.  I took the plunge and deleted the game after King went on their latest money grab, by taking both lives and boosters when a player closes a game without making a move.

title: You asked for it
text:

This game appears to be programmed to drop candies in such an order that it appears " unnatural" but totally works toward NOT letting you do good or win I have played lots of matching games and something's not right with this one. Delete!
